notes.text:
Use perfectly ripe avocados
Add feta cheese for extra flavor
Experiment with toppings like radishes or microgreens

steps.descr: Toast sourdough until golden and crispy

on_enter.say: Right, let's get that sourdough nice and toasty until it's golden and crispy. You'll know it's ready when it smells deliciously warm and looks beautifully golden.

steps.instructions: Toast sourdough until golden and crispy

steps.descr: Mash avocados with lemon juice and salt

on_enter.say: Now, let's get those avocados mashed up with a good squeeze of lemon juice and a pinch of salt. You want a nice, creamy texture with a bit of zing from the lemon.

steps.instructions: Mash avocados with lemon juice and salt

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Now spread that lovely avocado mixture over your crispy toast. Make sure you cover it all the way to the edges for maximum flavour.
Let's add some lovely halved cherry tomatoes on top. They'll add a burst of freshness and colour to your toast.

steps.descr: Add a poached or fried egg if desired

on_enter.say: If you're feeling a bit indulgent, let's pop a poached or fried egg on top. It'll make it even more satisfying!

steps.instructions: Add a poached or fried egg if desired

on_enter.say: Now, let's give it a nice drizzle of extra virgin olive oil. It'll add a lovely richness to the dish.

steps.descr: Sprinkle with red pepper flakes and sea salt

on_enter.say: Finally, let's sprinkle some red pepper flakes and a pinch of sea salt on top. It'll give your toast that extra kick and flavour. Perfect!

steps.instructions: Sprinkle with red pepper flakes and sea salt

recipe.title: Avocado Toast
recipe.description: Trendy breakfast with smashed avocado on toasted sourdough
